title: Sheep in the fold
memoryVerse: The Lord is my shephard I shall not want
meaning: Sheep fold is a place for santuary, when we enter into the sheep fold of God we are safe

list: Why do we go to service, we come to service to service out heart

body.header: Can God see me with Grace

list: We re not always sure of this answer when we were in the world
I can do all thing now
Few are in this world that wants wisdom
Why do we go to service, we come to service to service out heart

conclusion: We know that life is very very beautiful live it well
